    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  FilterEditor.EditorBorder
      Implementation of the Border associated to each filter editor.
      (package private) class  FilterEditor.EditorFilter
      Wrapper of the filter associated to the EditorComponent, ensuring some added functionality (like auto-adding to the history list when the filter changes).

        private void setupEnterKey(javax.swing.JComponent component)
        Change action for pressing enter key: on a popup, select the current item and close it.

        And unselect any possible selection

      • setupHomeCtrlKey

        private void setupHomeCtrlKey(javax.swing.JComponent component)

      • setupHomeKey

        private void setupHomeKey(javax.swing.JComponent component)
        If the focus is on the popup, Home moves the selected item to the first in the list -if it is the first on the choices list jumps to the first on the history list. Otherwise, just moves the caret position to the origin. Exceptionally, if the focus is on the popup and the selected item is already the very first shown, it also moves the caret position to the origin.

      • setupDownPageKey

        private void setupDownPageKey(javax.swing.JComponent component)
